> <OLD>
>
> There was a SMIRK from BLACKARACHNIA over at the three stooges.
>
> By this point, her hands were down 'wtihout' her gun, while her machine gun
> back weapons had taken over it and loaded it with three shots of triple
> strong venom in the interim as she watched.
>
> Purring over at the trio, "Well, I'm sure we can't come to a far more
> equitable agreement boys.."
>
> Checking on the sensors coming up online then as she then waited for the
> three to seem relaxed, not paying attention to her and bickering with one
> another..  To then try and shoot each one of them rapidly wtih a triple
> strong dose of paralytic venom in each sparkcase (the point of their armor
> where the torso plating around theis spark chambers was).

<NEW>

BAZOOKA, who had just regained complete control of his leg and hip
actuators looked up at BLACKARACHNIA. He had just enough time to
register her attack! He open his mouth in protest as one of her darts
hit him and sent him sliding to the ground in a heap!

GUILEDART turned to look at the BLACKARACHNIA as well and was caught
full in the chest as well, the dart sliding in where his armor was
weak. GUILEDART's optics flickered once and then a second time and
then he too joined his companion on the ground.

However KILLPUNCH was nothing if not paranoid and he was fully
expecting an attack of this sort. He merly turned to one side and used
the device he had in his hand to smack away BLACKARACHNIA's dart,
sending it flying into a tree - the tree immidiatly begining to wilt.

"Sooo!" He said as he turned back to orient on the large ebony colored
spider. "We let you live and you decide to attack us?"

He smiled as twin blasters flipped open from his shoulders. "Consider
this an end to our ceasefire!" He began sending round after round of
energized 'bullets' at BLACKARACHNIA!

(TAG)

- Preston
